TopicTitle: What would you think about a Spanish talking streaming?

Articles.Content:
I've recently bought a new computer (high end) and I'm considering starting to stream a little bit of KSP, mostly just playing with things I've already made.

The thing is, I'm spanish, I can read/write english to a standard degree, nothing fancy but well enough!, but talking might get a little bit out of control (which in some cases could be funnier, but I don't know!). Then I started to wander the Twitch streams and saw everyone was streaming in english..., and I though: well, it's a game made by (mostly I think) people who speak spanish, there must be spanish people around, and they might enjoy it!

Another possibility is just stream in english and have some fun in the process=)
